title: Biden to request funding for a new coronavirus vaccine
author: Associated Press
description: SOUTH LAKE TAHOE, California — President Joe Biden said Friday that he is planning to request more money from Congress to develop another new coronavirus vaccine, as scientists track new waves and hospitalizations rise, though not like before.
cleaned_text: Biden to request funding for a new coronavirus vaccine 0 Comments Wednesday, Sept. 6, 2023 | [ Today's Paper
